TITLE: Backward Design
DEF: A methodology that starts with defining educational goals, designs assessments to gauge whether they were achieved, and then for successful assessment.
TASK: The Backward Design  pattern supports a design methodology that starts from defined learning goals and desired outcomes, then designs assessments and activities to achieve them. To optimize BKDSN, focus on: clarifying learning objectives, alignment of assessments and activities, and iterative evaluation and revision.
